title: Chapelwaite’s Emily Hampshire on Haunted Houses and Playing a Female Stephen King
itunes:title: Chapelwaite’s Emily Hampshire on Haunted Houses and Playing a Female Stephen King
itunes:subtitle: Emily Hampshire joins the Losers to chat about her latest role as Rebecca Morgan in EPIX's new Stephen King series, Chapelwaite. The Canadian star discusses the creepy shooting locations, journaling in character, and local urban legends....
description:
Emily Hampshire joins the Losers to chat about her latest role as Rebecca Morgan in EPIX's new Stephen King series, Chapelwaite. The Canadian star discusses the creepy shooting locations, journaling in character, and local urban legends. She also digresses on why Rebecca is more or less the Stephen King of this story. Want to see the video interview? Become a member of our Patreon via patreon.com/thebarrens


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
